SettingItem.Name: Orbital.ApoapsisHeight
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's apoapsis height relative to sea level. (Apoapsis is the highest point of an orbit.)

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.PeriapsisHeight
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's periapsis height relative to sea level. (Periapsis is the lowest point of an orbit.)

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.TimeToApoapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the vessel reaches apoapsis, the highest point of the orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.TimeToPeriapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the vessel reaches periapsis, the lowest point of the orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.Inclination
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's orbital inclination relative to the Equator.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.TimeToEquatorialAscendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the vessel crosses northward over the Equator.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.TimeToEquatorialDescendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the vessel crosses southward over the Equator.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.AngleToEquatorialAscendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the vessel to the northward Equator crossing of the central body

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.AngleToEquatorialDescendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the vessel to the southward Equator crossing of the central body

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.Eccentricity
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's orbital eccentricity.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.OrbitalSpeed
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's orbital speed.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.OrbitalPeriod
SettingItem.Value: Shows the amount of time it will take to complete a full orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.CurrentSoi
SettingItem.Value: Shows the SOI of the current body the vessel is orbiting.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.LongitudeOfAscendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's longitude of the ascending node.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.LongitudeOfPeriapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's longitude of periapsis.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.SemiMajorAxis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the distance from the centre of an orbit to the farthest edge.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.SemiMinorAxis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the distance from the centre of an orbit to the nearest edge.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.AngleToPrograde
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the vessel to crossing the Orbit of the central body on it's retrograde side.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.AngleToRetrograde
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the vessel to crossing the Orbit of the central body on it's retrograde side.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeProgradeDeltaV
SettingItem.Value: Prograde/Retrograde component of the total change in velocity.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeNormalDeltaV
SettingItem.Value: Normal component of the total change in velocity.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeRadialDeltaV
SettingItem.Value: Radial component of the total change in velocity.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeTotalDeltaV
SettingItem.Value: Total change in velocity during the burn.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeBurnTime
SettingItem.Value: The burn's total duration.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeHalfBurnTime
SettingItem.Value: Half of the burn's total duration.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeTimeToManoeuvre
SettingItem.Value: Time until the vessel reaches the position of the Manoeuvre Node.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeTimeToHalfBurn
SettingItem.Value: Time until the Manoeuvre should be started.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeAngleToPrograde
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the Node to crossing the Orbit of the central body on it's prograde side.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.NodeAngleToRetrograde
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the Node to crossing the Orbit of the central body on it's retrograde side.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.PostBurnApoapsis
SettingItem.Value: Farthest point of the vessel's ofbit after the burn.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.PostBurnPeriapsis
SettingItem.Value: Closest point of the vessel's ofbit after the burn.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.SpeedAtApoapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the orbital speed of the vessel when at apoapsis, the highest point of the orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.SpeedAtPeriapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the orbital speed of the vessel when at periapsis, the lowest point of the orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Orbital.TimeToAtmosphere
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the vessel enters or leaves the atmosphere.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.AltitudeSeaLevel
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's altitude above sea level.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.AltitudeTerrain
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's altitude above the terrain and water's surface, or altitude above underwater terrain whilst splashed down.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.VerticalSpeed
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's vertical speed up and down.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.VerticalAcceleration
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's vertical acceleration up and down.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.HorizontalSpeed
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's horizontal speed across a celestial body's surface.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.HorizontalAcceleration
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's horizontal acceleration across a celestial body's surface.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.MachNumber
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's mach number.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.Latitude
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's latitude position around the celestial body. Latitude is the angle from the equator to poles.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.Longitude
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's longitude around a celestial body. Longitude is the angle from the bodies prime meridian.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.GeeForce
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current g-force and maximum g-force experienced.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.TerminalVelocity
SettingItem.Value: Shows the velocity where the efforts of thrust and drag are equalled out.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.AtmosphericEfficiency
SettingItem.Value: Shows you vessel's efficiency as a ratio of the current velocity and terminal velocity. Less than 100% means that you are losing efficiency due to gravity and greater than 100% is due to drag.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.Biome
SettingItem.Value: Shows the biome which the vessel is currently flying over.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.Situation
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's current scientific situation. (Landed, Splashed, Flying Low/High, In Space Low/High)

SettingItem.Name: Surface.Slope
SettingItem.Value: Shows the slope of the terrain below your vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.ImpactTime
SettingItem.Value: Shows time until the vessel impacts the central object.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.ImpactLongitude
SettingItem.Value: Longditude of the impact position.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.ImpactLatitude
SettingItem.Value: Latitude of the impact position.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.ImpactAltitude
SettingItem.Value: Altitude at which the Vessel will impact.

SettingItem.Name: Surface.ImpactBiome
SettingItem.Value: Biome the Vessel will impact in.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Name
SettingItem.Value: Displays the name of the current vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.DeltaVStaged
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's delta velocity for each stage.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.DeltaVCurrent
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's current stage delta velocity.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.DeltaVTotal
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's total delta velocity.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.DeltaVCurrentTotal
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's current stage delta velocity and total.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.SpecificImpulse
SettingItem.Value: Shows the average Specific Impulse of all engines in the current stage.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Mass
SettingItem.Value: Displays the total Mass of the Vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Thrust
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current and maximum thrust the vessel can put out.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.ThrustToWeight
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's actual and total thrust to weight ratio.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.ThrustOffsetAngle
SettingItem.Value: Thrust angle offset due to vessel asymmetries and gimballing

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.ThrustTorque
SettingItem.Value: Thrust torque due to vessel asymmetries and gimballing

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.SurfaceThrustToWeight
SettingItem.Value: Shows the vessel's surface thrust to weight ratio.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Acceleration
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current and maximum acceleration of the craft.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.SuicideBurnAltitude
SettingItem.Value: Shows the altitude when to start a suicide burn.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.SuicideBurnDistance
SettingItem.Value: Shows the distance to the point at which to start a suicide burn.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.SuicideBurnDeltaV
SettingItem.Value: Shows the DeltaV of a suicide burn.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.IntakeAirUsage
SettingItem.Value: Displays the consumption of Intake Air.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.IntakeAirDemand
SettingItem.Value: Displays the Amount of Intake Air required.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.IntakeAirSupply
SettingItem.Value: Displays the available Intake Air.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.IntakeAirDemandSupply
SettingItem.Value: Displays the Ratio between required and available Intake Air.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.PartCount
SettingItem.Value: Shows the total number of Parts the current and next stage.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Heading
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current Heading.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Pitch
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current Pitch angle.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.Roll
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current Roll angle.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.HeadingRate
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current change in Heading.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.PitchRate
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current Pitch speed.

SettingItem.Name: Vessel.RollRate
SettingItem.Value: Shows the current Roll speed.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TargetSelector
SettingItem.Value: A tool to allow easy browsing, searching and selection of targets.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.PhaseAngle
SettingItem.Value: Angular distance of the vessel relative to the target object.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.RelativeVelocity
SettingItem.Value: Shows the relative velocity between your vessel and the target object.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.RelativeSpeed
SettingItem.Value: Shows the difference in orbital speed between your vessel and the target object.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.RelativeInclination
SettingItem.Value: Shows the relative inclination between your vessel and the target object.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TimeToRelativeAscendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Time until the vessel crosses the target's orbit, going north.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TimeToRelativeDescendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Time until the vessel crosses the target's orbit, going south.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.AngleToRelativeAscendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the vessel to crossing the orbit of the target object, going north of it.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.AngleToRelativeDescendingNode
SettingItem.Value: Angular Distance from the vessel to crossing the orbit of the target object, going south of it.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.AltitudeSeaLevel
SettingItem.Value: Shows the target's altitude above sea level.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.ApoapsisHeight
SettingItem.Value: Shows the targets's apoapsis height relative to sea level. (Apoapsis is the highest point of an orbit.)

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.PeriapsisHeight
SettingItem.Value: Shows the targets's periapsis height relative to sea level. (Periapsis is the lowest point of an orbit.)

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TimeToApoapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the target reaches apoapsis, the highest point of the orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TimeToPeriapsis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the time until the target reaches periapsis, the lowest point of the orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.Distance
SettingItem.Value: Current distance between the vessel and the target object.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.OrbitalPeriod
SettingItem.Value: Shows the amount of time it will take the target object to complete a full orbit.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.SemiMajorAxis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the distance from the centre of the target's orbit to the farthest edge.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.SemiMinorAxis
SettingItem.Value: Shows the distance from the centre of the target's orbit to the nearest edge.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.RelativeRadialVelocity
SettingItem.Value: Relative radial velocity between your vessel and the target object

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TimeToRendezvous
SettingItem.Value: Approximate (linearly) time to the minimum distance between objects.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CriticalPart
SettingItem.Value: This part is structually most critical. If it endures too high temperature there is a high chance for major structual failure!

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CriticalTemperature
SettingItem.Value: Internal Temperature on the part of the Vessel that is structually most critical.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CriticalSkinTemperature
SettingItem.Value: Highest external Temperature on the part of the Vessel that is structually most critical.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CriticalThermalPercentage
SettingItem.Value: Shows how high a temperature the critical Part is enduring relative to it's maximal temperature.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.HottestPart
SettingItem.Value: The part of the vessel that is enduring the highest temperature.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.HottestTemperature
SettingItem.Value: Highest internal Temperature on the Vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.HottestSkinTemperature
SettingItem.Value: Highest external Temperature on the Vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CoolestPart
SettingItem.Value: The part of the vessel that is enduring the lowest temperature.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CoolestTemperature
SettingItem.Value: Lowest internal Temperature on the Vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Thermal.CoolestSkinTemperature
SettingItem.Value: Lowest external Temperature on the Vessel.

SettingItem.Name: Miscellaneous.Separator
SettingItem.Value: Creats a line to help seperate subsections in a module.

SettingItem.Name: Miscellaneous.GuiSizeAdjustor
SettingItem.Value: Shows a control that will allow you to adjust the GUI size.

SettingItem.Name: Miscellaneous.SimulationDelay
SettingItem.Value: Controls the minimum delay between processing vessel simulations.

SettingItem.Name: Miscellaneous.VectoredThrustToggle
SettingItem.Value: Shows a control that will allow you to adjust whether the vessel simulation should account for vectored thrust.

SettingItem.Name: Miscellaneous.SystemTime
SettingItem.Value: Shows the System Time in 12 hour format (AM/PM)

SettingItem.Name: Miscellaneous.LogSimToggle
SettingItem.Value: Shows a button that allows you to make the next run of the simulation code dump extra debugging output.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TargetLatitude
SettingItem.Value: Shows the target vessel's latitude position around the celestial body. Latitude is the angle from the equator to poles.

SettingItem.Name: Rendezvous.TargetLongitude
SettingItem.Value: Shows the target vessel's longitude around a celestial body. Longitude is the angle from the bodies prime meridian.
